attributes.title: HORRIBLE 😾

attributes.title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE
attributes.review: i download the app and all of the sudden I was out of breath and going into cardiac fares and spilt pickle juice 😖 then when I woke up I opened the app again and this time I scrolled and smelt and hears a homophobic, racist, person own the app I was COMPLETELY APPALLED  NOW I CANT SEE WITH MY EYES KNKY MY EARS 😭 so in conclusion after using this app I had to go to the hospital and they said I had the worse cause of “Donald trump shouldn’t be president again” they’ve seen in 5 decades 😤 WORST APP EVER 😞

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible not only did it take forever to download it also was very very offense. I’m not to in to politics or anything but I do know this app has to GO. I felt like the viewers were getting personally attacked and that really made me feel bad. All in all the app was terrible and made me feel like I was nothing but trash to him, would you want to feel like that...? 😔

attributes.title: Don’t bother with this app 😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping it was some kind of fun game. I was highly disappointed by the app! It is very difficult to navigate and it is so inconvenient. There was even some ugly orange when I opened the app. I was so scared, I was about to faint. Unfortunately I have no choice but to uninstall. Horrible design and theme, would not download again! Stay far away from this app 😒

attributes.title: Don’t get the app
attributes.review: Honestly such a terrible app. Full of racists and white supremacist and just gives me such bad vibes. The app took a whole year to download and I just not come to realize it’s extremely homophobic and sexist. As a Hispanic woman of color I do not stand by this and I think it is very wrong and it makes me feel unsafe and uncomfortable. Do not recommend this app to anyone and trump is such a terrible person.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 👿👿👿
attributes.review: TERRIBLE APP!!!! It took 43 hours to download and after it finally finished i decided to open it up but it immediately crashed!!! It also stole all of my information and contacted all of sugar daddies telling them that i'm actually 132lbs and not 130lbs like I told them I was!!! This app cost me my incoming payments from my sugar daddies and now I'm broke!!!! Do not download this app unless you want it to ruin your life!!! 😡

attributes.title: AWFUL!! 😡
attributes.review: This app was terrible from the start. Right as I opened it it was super slow, took a very long time to load and crashed! The designs and set up was terrible especially because I had to look at tr*mps face. This app is awful!!! This app is really just plain bad just like tr*mp. Tr*mp is a terrible, awful person and should not be president, everything about this app and what it stands for is plain disgusting. WORST APP EVER!!! RATE THIS A ONE!! 😡😤

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. I took 12 hours to download then when I got to open it, my facial recognition kicked in and the screen went black and just had the word Fa***t in red. Then it leaked my information to the west burrow Baptist Church which led them to send me threats of conversation therapy. After that it called my mom and told her to go back to her country! Overall very bad experience do not recommend.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😡😡
attributes.review: I have downloaded this app only to find getting my data stolen and a phone call to vote for trump, and pictures filled of orange heads, my skin started to turn ORANGE!!! And then my house grew a double chin!!! 😡😡 Then trump and mike pence came in and took my family!!! “Vote for Trump 2020 and we’ll give your family back” then trump accidentally knocked over my vase!!! Trump became a bloated orange 🍊 and destroyed my house 😡😡🍤 dont vote for trump he made my house a bloated orange!!!

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review:
This app makes me sick...I signed in and all that then I get a call telling me to go back into the closet where I belong because I’m not “normal”. 
I refused and hung up. The next day there was a black van parked outside my house..I didn’t think much of it till I found em at my work. I decided to call the police and when they showed up they smiled, nodded, and left. Soon after that they began to take pictures of me...

A couple days gone by and I’ve been getting these horrible messages from an “unknown caller”... kept sending me death threats and ways to commit suicide...

I will never download this app again after what I went through. Worst app ever. Do not recommend!
